title: Bread Machine Caraway Rye Recipe
full_text:
Bread Machine Caraway Rye Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
3 hrs
Active
10 mins
Cooling Time
60 mins
Total
4 hrs
Serves
10
to 12 servings
Makes
1 loaf
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
teaspoon
instant yeast
1
tablespoon
sugar
4 1/2
ounces
(about
1
cup
)
rye flour
9
ounces
(about
1 3/4
cups
)
bread flour
1
teaspoon
salt
1
tablespoon
caraway seeds
1
tablespoon
balsamic vinegar
1 1/4
cups
water
1
tablespoon
olive oil
Directions
Put all ingredients into your bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer. Set the machine for a standard loaf (if the machine has several settings), a large loaf, and a dark crust.
When the bread is done, remove it from the machine, remove it from the pan, and let it cool completely on a rack before slicing.
Yeast Breads
Rye
